data.message: Add GSAP scrollytelling to Intersphere homepage: Installed GSAP + ScrollTrigger. Created useScrollAnimation hook. Added scroll-triggered animations: Featured section stagger, feature cards with 3D rotation entrance, connection dots with back.out easing, How It Works stagger, CTA dramatic reveal. Homepage JS increased from 4KB to 49KB (GSAP bundle). Build passing, deployed.
